```{bash}
source bioinf_config_inclass.sh

mkdir -p $PE_STAROUT_DIR
ls -l $PE_OUT_DIR
```

```{bash}
STAR \
    --runMode alignReads \
    --twopassMode None \
    --genomeDir $GENOME_DIR \
    --readFilesIn $PE_TRIM_DIR/SRR12804464_1_trimmed.fastq.gz $PE_TRIM_DIR/SRR12804464_2_trimmed.fastq.gz \
    --readFilesCommand gunzip -c \
    --outFileNamePrefix $PE_STAROUT_DIR/SRR12804464_ \
    --quantMode GeneCounts \
    --outSAMtype BAM SortedByCoordinate \
    --outSAMunmapped Within \
    --runThreadN $TOTAL_THREADS
```

```{bash}
ls $PE_STAROUT_DIR
```
